profile:
WE’RE PART OF A CANADIAN COOPERATIVE OF HEATING, VENTILATION AND AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC) CONTRACTORS

Comfort Plus ClimateCare is part of the ClimateCare cooperative, which is Canada’s largest network of independent heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) contractors. 
We’re 100% member owned, and we’ve been that way since the cooperative formed in 1999.
The ClimateCare cooperative is a network of local businesses spread across Ontario, dedicated to delivering on the high standards associated with the ClimateCare name. 
When you work with a ClimateCare member, you’re supporting the economy closest to where you live.

Choice – You can choose from big brand names or house brands that come with added value. If you want, we can make recommendations of products that will best fit your needs, but there’s never any pressure to follow our recommendation.

Flexibility – Accommodating payment plans that can limit the financial disruption of unexpected home repairs.

Peace-of-mind – Know that you’re getting the best value for your investment. Our quality standards are second to none and our services set industry standards.

Partnership – We don’t just work for you, we partner with you. We have longstanding relationships with our customers.

Transparency – If you need a repair or new system, our technicians can show you exactly why. We’re committed to customer satisfaction with our 100% satisfaction guarantee.

BRANTFORD (519) 752-2250
HAMILTON (905) 388-4800
CAMBRIDGE (519) 658-6441
